hero.title: Hello, I'm Chloe !
hero.subtitle: Currently in 2nd year in ENSEEIHT, i'm studying to become a software engineer :)

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I’m a curious learner who loves exploring new technologies and finding creative solutions. After my double degree in computer science and mathematics at Université Toulouse III, I joined ENSEEIHT to pursue a software engineer career !
about.p2: My love for computer science mostly came from video games. Since I was little, I loved action-adventure and puzzle games ; the Legend of Zelda games being my favorites of all time. I wanted to create games that would move people the way they moved me. Now I enjoy creating any type of software ;)
about.p3: I would describle myself as creative. I love trying new hobbies and turning crazy ideas into reality : a few examples would be SFX and artistic makeup, drawing, as well as sewing. I also am currently leanring how to play the guitar !
about.p4: I also run ! It is a great way for me to evacuate stress but also to push myself to my limit ! Right now, my biggest accomplishment is a sub two hours half marathon, and I am training for my first ever full marathon ! It really teaches discipline and rigor.

hero.title: Bonjour, je suis Chloé !
hero.subtitle: Actuellement étudiante à l'ENSEEIHT, j'aimerais devenir ingénrieure logiciel :)

about.title: À propos de moi
about.p1: Je suis une personne curieuse qui aime explorer de nouvelles technologies et trouver des solutions créatives.
about.p2: La collaboration est au cœur de mon travail — j’aime travailler en équipe et partager mes connaissances.
about.p3: En dehors du code, je pratique la photographie et le design, qui nourrissent ma créativité.
